title: SoC COMM_ST 394-0-22 Communication Studies Research Seminar

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Smartphone apps are widely designed and used to engage people in positive behavioral changes in recent years, ranging from weight loss, healthy diet and exercise to meditation practice and eco-friendly behaviors. This course is designed to understand how we can design technology to engage people in healthy and eco-friendly behaviors, and to what extent it leads to successful outcomes. Students will learn to draft an empirical research proposal to study how technology can be used to improve or change a behavior of their interest.
